sub_title: Social Entrepreneur. Co-Founder at mHS CITY LAB
summary:
https://web.neev.cloud/
"Organize and digitalize the world’s housing and sanitation construction information and make it universally accessible and easy to use". This is the ambitious mission that I've been leading since the past four years at mHS! We do believe in the critical role that access to construction technical inputs could play for low-income communities to improve quality and safety (resilience) of buildings! CTA (Construction Technical Assistance) leads also to better financial planning, maintenance, retrofitting and reconstruction practices. For our project we adopt digital and mobile connected platforms to bridge the gap between professionals and low-income communities to bring customized technical input at scale in a way never explored before. Look at our digital tool NEEV at thttps://web.neev.cloud/
[Thanks to our supporter: CISCO USA, Access, SVAM International, NASSCOM]

NEEV is a B2B digital platform that gives simple, efficient and expert housing solutions for end-users and agencies  offering housing products. Designed to make technical constructional information more accessible, it hopes to facilitate transparent and trustworthy relationships between homeowners and financial institutions.

With the ongoing rapid urbanisation, informal settlements are offering affordable housing to millions in Indian cities today, including new migrants looking for livelihood opportunities in urban centers. 
Apart from the lack of basic services, these settlements suffer from poor quality construction which is often seismically unsafe. 
Since its inception in 2009, mHS has been designing projects and services to catalyze the incremental construction in these settlements. A particular focus is on how to provide access to technical assistance to people engaging in incremental housing to make these communities more resilient to climate change and natural hazards.', 'title': 'Co-Founder, Director', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'architectural offices', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': None, 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2003}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}}, 'company': 'architectural offices', 'description': '2003/2009 -Own Practice.
